alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 26 at 6:26AM EST until December 26 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Eastern Marion, Central Marion and Western Marion Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Remain alert for rapid changes in visibility especially near lakes, rivers and other bodies of water.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion
